entry.title: Setting up Octopress
entry.content: When setting up Octopress I found a lot of the setup a little awkward to get my head around. Maybe this is just a little inexperience but this [post] (http://learnaholic.me/2012/10/10/deploying-octopress-to-github-pages-and-setting-custom-subdomain-cname/) made it a lot easier to understand and came with instruction on how to setup up the CNAME record.

entry.title: Octopress on the Pi
entry.content:
Octopress on the Raspberry Pi

Octopress on the Raspberry Pi isn’t too hard ti install but ensure you are working on the correct branch before pushing.

You’ll need:

  • Ruby
  • Ruby-dev
  • Git

Also ensure git is set up properly as the rake jobs don’t error particularly well….
